titles.title: To amend the Truth in Lending Act to require lenders to post current interest rates charged for various categories of loans to consumers.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Banking and Financial Services.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Financial Institutions and Consumer Credit.

committee.name: House Committee on Banking and Financial Services

bill.summary: 1/4/1995--Introduced. Amends the Truth in Lending Act to require lenders to post the interest rates charged for each consumer loan category in clear and conspicuous language and in an easily visible location on the business premises.
